props.name: transition
props.description: Turn off or turn on animate

props.name: enterClass
props.description:
Define the animation class name when the dialog is entering.
you can refer to vue.js [Custom-Transition-Classes]

props.name: transparent
props.description: It will determine whether the mask is transparent.

props.name: show
props.description: The prop which Control the dialog box on or off.

props.name: force
props.description: Decide whether to close the dialog when clicking the mask.

events.name: on-confirm
events.description: Dispatched when OK button is clicked

events.name: on-cancel
events.description: Dispatched when Cancel button is clicked

events.name: on-close
events.description: Dispatched when dialog will be closed.
